GSD.description:
blk-throttle: prevent overflow while calculating wait time

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit ca67b0563b39e79290c23e509319c178b9ca9104. For more details please see the references link.
